title: #481: The Deep Similarities Between Harry and Neville
description:
• We take a deep dive into Harry and Neville’s parallel journeys throughout the Harry Potter series
  • Muggle Mail covers how you correct someone who is wrong about Harry Potter, Snape fan fiction and more
  • The Chronicles of Narnia, Lord of the Rings and King Arthur: the hosts share some of their favorite stories influenced by cultural artifacts
  • Let's get religious (not really)! We compare Harry to Jesus and Neville to John The Baptist
  • Linked from the start via prophecy, did anyone suspect pre-Order of the Phoenix that Neville would prove to play such a significant role?
  • The hosts share their Favorite Neville Moments from the Harry Potter Series
  • A book-by-book analysis of Harry and Neville's journeys
  • Were Harry and Neville's upbringing really all that dissimilar?
  • We discuss Harry and Neville both being orphaned and having their parents taken from them by Voldemort and the Death Eaters
  • Harry and Neville both kill a giant snake... with the Sword of Gryffindor... pulled from The Sorting Hat!
  • Snape has quite the penchant for picking on Harry... and Neville! Does he partially blame Neville for what befell his beloved Lily Potter?
  • Dumbledore's Army, The Department of Mysteries and the Evolution of Neville Longbottom
  • Neville, much like John The Baptist, is the leader of the resistance within Hogwarts in Deathly Hallows
  • Neville's confrontation with Voldemort
  • Quizzitch: When exactly does Neville say he will join Voldemort?
  • You can join our community at Patreon.com/MuggleCast and receive magical benefits, including Bonus MuggleCast! This week, we discuss an update on Fantastic Beasts 3 filming!
  • This week's episode is brought to you by ThirdLove (find your perfect fitting bra by going to Thirdlove.com/mugglecast, and get 15% off your first order), HelloFresh (Visit HelloFresh.com/mugglecast80 and get your first 8 meals free) and BetterHelp (visit BetterHelp.com/mugglecast and get 10% off).
